content.description:
EMPLOYMENT IN AGRICULTURE, FOR SELECTED REGIONS, 1991-2019

Source: World Bank

The graph shows regional trends in employment in agriculture since 1991.
content.question:
A. Compare the trend lines for the region of East Asia and the Pacific with the world trend for the 2006 to 2019 time period.

B. Explain the degree to which political push factors have affected agricultural employment in the region of Latin America and the Caribbean.

C. Explain a possible limitation of the data in the graph to illustrate the impacts of large-scale commercial agriculture operations on the agricultural percentage of the workforce.

D. Using a region on the graph, explain how the region’s changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the diets of consumers.
